title: That feeling when you are so close to winning a 4v5 you just turned around
body: and at 50 minutes you just get stomped on and lose after taking baron

replies.body: that feeling you get when you win a 4v4 teamfight at there base and get backdoored by yi.

I feel you- there was a stubborn Nasus that continuously raged at me for turning down the surrender vote because we were getting stomped, but I managed to convince the rest of the team to play until late game.

We won two team fights and got to the nexus turret, but we threw the final fight and lost... :'(
